Text: NERC Training Resources Announcement June TO NERC ROSTER STANDARDS LISTSERVER GROUP OPERATING MANUAL OWNERS SYSTEM OPERATOR TRAINERS The following documents are posted on the NERC Training Resources web site New ETag Feature Potential Adjust List PAL May memo REVISED Revision in Handling Interchange Transaction Curtailments during TLR Level b The NERC OC approved a change in the TLR Procedure at the request of the Market Interface Committee This change will affect the handling of Firm PointtoPoint Transmission Service and will become effective June ocsosresourceshtml Thank you Barbara S Bogenrief SecretaryOperations NERC

ETag Implementation ScheduleROSTER STANDARDS LISTSERVER GROUP NERC OPERATING MANUAL OWNERS SYSTEM OPERATOR TRAINERS WSCC ISAS OASIS SCHEUDLING COLLABORATIVE A letter is attached from Robert W Cummings Director Transmission Services regarding the status of ETag Version implementation The letter is also available for download from the following NERC web site filezishtml Thank you Barbara Bogenrief SecretaryOperations Letter ETag Implementation Sep pdf

Standards Announcement January PST TO NERC ROSTER STANDARDS LISTSERVER GROUP OPERATING MANUAL OWNERS SYSTEM OPERATOR TRAINERS Ladies and Gentlemen In complying with the Organization Standards Process Manual we are now presenting Appendix A Electronic Tagging Service Performance Requirements and Failure Procedures for your review before balloting Step of the Standards Development Process st ballot on the approval of this Appendix Appendix AA describes the performance requirements of an ETag System Component failure The Appendix will provide entities with guidance and requirements that they can provide to vendors and incorporate into vendor contracts for software and systems related to interchange Transaction tagging The draft standard Appendix A all comments received and the responses to those comments are attached The same information is available from the NERC website at ocstandards All members of the Standards Committee are eligible to vote on the approval of this standard Draft Standards can be viewed or downloaded from the following NERC web site ocstandards Thank you Barbara S Bogenrief SecretaryOperations

Standards Announcement December PST TO NERC ROSTER STANDARDS LISTSERVER OPERATING MANUAL OWNERS SYSTEM OPERATOR TRAINERS Ladies and Gentlemen The Personnel Subcommittee has posted a Continuing Education Units White Paper and would like your comments on the merits of establishing a Continuing Education Program Your comments are due February You can view or download the White Paper from the following NERC web site standards Thank you Barbara S Bogenrief SecretaryOperations

Announcement ESC Membership RegistrationPST TO NERC ROSTER STANDARDS LISTSERVER GROUP OPERATING MANUAL OWNERS SYSTEM OPERATOR TRAINERS ELECTRONIC SCHEDULING COLLABORATIVE OASIS STANDARDS COLLABORATIVE The Electronic Scheduling Collaborative is a collaboration of Stakeholders in the Wholesale Electric Power Industry joined for the purpose of developing standard Business Practices for Open Access SameTime Information System OASIS Phase II and Electronic Scheduling At its January meeting the Electronic Scheduling Collaborative ESC adopted the Governance and Bylaws that require industry sector voting The ESC will conduct business in accordance with the new Governance and Bylaws at its February meeting Please see Section III Members of the Bylaws If you plan to participate as an Active Member ie represent a legitimate industry stakeholder and vote you must register and select the segment you will represent The complete registration process and forms can be found at the following web site esc The Governance and Bylaws are posted on the web site below escRelatedFilesasp Please contact Gordon Scott if you have any questions Thank you Barbara S Bogenrief SecretaryOperations North American Electric Reliability Council Princeton Forrestal Village Village Boulevard Princeton NJ fax Email
